verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: released] [ARG1: the disclosures] [ARG2: for Kushner and Ivanka Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on a heavy news day] , [ARGM-ADV: while the media lavished attention on the North Korea summit] .
The White House released the disclosures for Kushner and Ivanka Trump on a heavy news day , while [ARG0: the media] [V: lavished] [ARG1: attention] [ARG2: on the North Korea summit] .
